lyrics.lyric: Working For The Weekend
lyrics.tlyric: 为周末而工作

lyrics.lyric: I've been working for the weekend
lyrics.tlyric: 我为了享受周末而努力工作

lyrics.lyric: But that weekend never came
lyrics.tlyric: 但那个周末从来没到过

lyrics.lyric: Will you pat my back tomorrow
lyrics.tlyric: 明天你能拍拍我的背吗？

lyrics.lyric: If I break my back today
lyrics.tlyric: 如果我今天工作非常努力

lyrics.lyric: Yup, yeah it's 7am
lyrics.tlyric: 现在是早上7点

lyrics.lyric: And I can't seem to keep my eyes shut
lyrics.tlyric: 我看起来还不能闭上双眼

lyrics.lyric: Even if I get up
lyrics.tlyric: 即使我已经起床

lyrics.lyric: Even if I get beat down
lyrics.tlyric: 即使我已经被打倒

lyrics.lyric: Will I be fine (Na-na-na-na)
lyrics.tlyric: 我日子会好起来吗

lyrics.lyric: If I do my time (Na-na-na-na)
lyrics.tlyric: 如果我工作都做完了

lyrics.lyric: I guess I'll sleep when I am dead
lyrics.tlyric: 我想我会睡到天荒地老

lyrics.lyric: I've been working for the weekend
lyrics.tlyric: 我为了享受周末而努力工作

lyrics.lyric: But that weekend never came
lyrics.tlyric: 但那个周末从来没到过

lyrics.tlyric: 明天你能拍拍我的背吗？

lyrics.lyric: If I break my back today
lyrics.tlyric: 如果我今天工作非常努力

lyrics.lyric: I've been going off the deep end
lyrics.tlyric: 我的情绪已经失控

lyrics.lyric: My sanity's at stake
lyrics.tlyric: 我的理智正在崩溃

lyrics.lyric: Will you pat my back tomorrow
lyrics.tlyric: 明天你能拍拍我的背吗？

lyrics.lyric: If I break my back today
lyrics.tlyric: 如果我今天工作非常努力

lyrics.lyric: If I break my back today
lyrics.tlyric: 如果我今天工作非常努力

lyrics.lyric: Baby, you know
lyrics.tlyric: 宝贝，你知道的

lyrics.lyric: I was broke
lyrics.tlyric: 我曾经一贫如洗

lyrics.lyric: Well, I still am
lyrics.tlyric: 好吧，我现在也是

lyrics.lyric: Mama said if you don't work
lyrics.tlyric: 妈妈说我要是不工作

lyrics.lyric: It might hit the fan (I got it)
lyrics.tlyric: 我的生活可能会一团糟（我明白了）

lyrics.lyric: I'm on my money grind
lyrics.tlyric: 我正在努力赚钱

lyrics.lyric: I'm digging up bands
lyrics.tlyric: 我努力发掘乐队

lyrics.lyric: You cannot find me in the club
lyrics.tlyric: 你不会在俱乐部里看见我

lyrics.lyric: Unless I'm saving at Sam's
lyrics.tlyric: 除非我在山姆超市充钱

lyrics.lyric: Cause I'm a work work work work workaholic
lyrics.tlyric: 因为我是一个工作，工作，工作，工作，工作狂

lyrics.lyric: And a guap guap guap guap guapaholic (true)
lyrics.tlyric: 一个见钱，钱，钱，钱，钱眼开的财迷（确实）

lyrics.lyric: They say I've got a problem
lyrics.tlyric: 他们说我病的不轻

lyrics.lyric: I believe in money trees
lyrics.tlyric: 但我相信会有摇钱树

lyrics.lyric: I've been working on the weekend
lyrics.tlyric: 我周末也在工作

lyrics.lyric: To cop a spot in Belize
lyrics.tlyric: 为了能去伯利兹

lyrics.lyric: Will you stick by (Na-na-na-na)
lyrics.tlyric: 你会继续支持我吗？

lyrics.lyric: While I do my time (Na-na-na-na)
lyrics.tlyric: 当我正在卖力工作

lyrics.lyric: I guess we'll hang when I'm dead
lyrics.tlyric: 我猜等我进棺材了，我们才能一起出去闲逛

tlyric.lyric:
[00:00.01]我努力工作只为双休日
[00:02.662]但那个双休日却从来没有到来
[00:04.940]明天你能拍拍我的背吗？
[00:07.149]若我今天过度劳损
[00:11.232]
[00:13.088]这才早上7点
[00:14.493]我还睡眼惺忪
[00:18.244]即使我此刻已经起床
[00:19.481]即使我被压力打到
[00:20.368]
[00:20.950]我是否还安然无恙？
[00:22.311]
[00:23.336]若我能抽出时间
[00:24.608]
[00:25.626]我想我会一直沉睡下去，直到我的生命终结
[00:28.183]
[00:28.617]我努力工作只为双休日
[00:30.943]但那个双休日却从来没有到来
[00:33.272]明天你能拍拍我的背吗？
[00:35.610]若我今天过度劳损
[00:38.058]我一直走在悬崖边
[00:40.470]我的理智正在崩塌
[00:42.788]明天你能拍拍我的背吗？
[00:45.201]若我今天过度劳损
[00:47.623]若我今天过度劳损
[00:48.708]宝贝，你知道的
[00:49.744]我一贫如洗
[00:50.175]但我依旧是堂堂正正的男子汉
[00:51.392]妈妈说我要是不工作
[00:52.211]你可能会被众人唾弃
[00:53.913]我在努力赚钱
[00:54.997]为了1000美金而奋斗
[00:55.898]你不会在俱乐部里看见我的身影
[00:57.181]除非我在sam家存钱
[00:58.436]因为我是个工作狂
[01:01.082]钞票一沓一沓堆起
[01:03.420]他们说我钻进钱眼里了
[01:04.560]但人会说谎，金钱不会说谎
[01:05.643]我周末也在工作
[01:06.781]去伯利兹建立一个据点
[01:08.093]

[01:09.402]
[01:10.831]当我正在善用我的一分一秒
[01:12.137]
[01:13.170]我想我们死的方式一定是凄惨的
